I would bring back Galileo Galilei to explore the heliocentric model of the solar system and its implications on the scientific revolution.
I would bring back Leonardo da Vinci to discuss his ideas on human anatomy and the natural world.
I would bring back Alexander the Great to discuss his conquests and the legacy of his empire.
I would bring back Mahatma Gandhi to discuss his philosophy of non-violent resistance and its relevance to modern-day activism.
I would bring back Cleopatra to discuss her role as a political leader and her contributions to Egyptian culture and history.
